item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 6, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Wealthfolio: A Private, Open-Source Investment Tracker (238 points | 70 comments)
2. Did Sandia use a thermonuclear secondary in a product logo? (410 points | 124 comments)
3. Advanced Python: Achieving High Performance with Code Generation (59 points | 40 comments)

6. SAMA – open-source Chat server (39 points | 23 comments)

8. Parkinson's may begin in the gut, study says, adding to growing evidence (27 points | 13 comments)
9. UE5 Nanite in WebGPU (365 points | 105 comments)

11. PermitFlow (YC W22) Is Hiring Senior/Staff+ Engineers and Designers in NYC ( | hide)

20. The origins of the steam engine (2023) (81 points | 10 comments)
21. Launch HN: Maitai (YC S24) – Self-Optimizing LLM Platform (138 points | 72 comments)
22. Summing Blue Noise Octaves Like Perlin Noise (31 points | 3 comments)
23. Serverless-registry: A Docker registry backed by Workers and R2 (162 points | 63 comments)
24. Common food dye found to make skin and muscle temporarily transparent (308 points | 126 comments)
25. The work you do, the person you are (2017) (91 points | 29 comments)
26. Show HN: We built a FOSS documentation CMS with a pretty GUI (132 points | 26 comments)
27. Nntpit: Minimalist Reddit2nntp Gateway (22 points | 3 comments)

29. The 'Freakish Radio Writings' of 1924 (72 points | 6 comments)
30. Clojure 1.12.0 is now available (341 points | 81 comments)
